page.title: 10DOVER:FREIGHT TRAFFIC
page.content:
Over nine years the growth of traffic has increased considerably.In 1975 there were two hundred and eighty thousand road haulage units.Recently, in 1984 the growth of cargo transport has increased to seven hundred and forty thousand units.This is due to the fact that Dover is the centre of European trade.Dover is now Britain's premier port in terms of value of total haulage.
Over ten billion pounds worth of goods passes through Dover each year and there are twenty five thousand ship movements.The growth of traffic has increased also due to the fact that the English Channel is the world's busiest seaway and is used by ships from virtually every maritime nation.
